Clarity – Claim 20

The term particular criteria used in claim 20 is vague and unclear

Concicesness – Claim 11

Although claims 1 and 11 have been same subject-matter and to differ from each other only with regard to the definition of the subject-matter for which protection is sought and/or in respect of the terminology used for the features of that subject-matter. The aforementioned claims therefore lack conciseness and as such do not meet the requirements of Article 6 PCT.
